name: table-cli-flipper
description: A simple cyan colored table for your data that allows you to format columns and flip your data.

scripts.deployDev: tsc --listEmittedFiles && npm run test && npm run generate:readme && git add -A && git commit -a -m "deploy tsc build" && npm version patch && git pull --progress -v --no-rebase "origin" && git push --tags --progress "origin" master:master

author: darklightcode <https://github.com/darklightcode> (https://github.com/darklightcode)
